name: Eerie (cameron)
description:
Eerie is a first person horror game about a strange nightmare location in which the main character is trapped. It is up to the player to find a way out, and to find out how they got stuck there in the first place.

HOW TO PLAY

  1. Download the .zip file
  2. Unzip the folder in your documents
  3. Open the folder and click on the file named "Eerie"
  4. Have fun!
